titleStmt.title: Can I use my iPad to test my application instead of only the iOS simulator bundled with XCode? [duplicate]
titleStmt.author: Rola Masrie

signatureContent.p: Reputation: 38Number of Gold Badges: 0Number of Silver Badges: 1Number of Bronze Badges: 7

post.p: Is this possible or do I have to create a prepaid account for $99?iosxcode4.5

div.head: marked as duplicate by jessehouwing , Amar , Wain , David Rönnqvist , woz Feb 28 '14 at 16:51

post.p: This question has been asked before and already has an answer. If those answers do not fully address your question, please ask a new question .

I think you need a prepaid account indeed to deploy anything on an apple device. Otherwise it would mean anybody could hack a non-accepted application to people's devices, which would make iPhones and iPads pretty vulnerable toâ€¦ well basically anything so I guess the answer is common sense.
